title: NEW CLIENT
body: My client keeps freezing,it only froze in champ select but it freezes anytime anywhere.It started freezing get the legacy client retired.Can someone please tell me the solution to this.Thnx

replies.body: This can happen if your PC is getting overloaded, or a connection problem causing you to lose sync.  Start off by enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode, which should disable the aesthetics causing that stress.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it works out for you.
